
```{r}
library(mplot)

set.seed(315)

mcvis_mplot = mcvis::mcvis(
  mplot::artificialeg[,1:9],
  standardise_method = "studentise")

mcvis_mplot$MC

png(filename = "figures/Fig4.png", width = 350, height = 400)
mcvis::igraph_mcvis(mcvis_mplot, eig.max = 1)
dev.off()
```
